They do it all, fire, water damage, smoke, cleanup.   Call Justin or Chris 339-5022, they'll take care of you!!!!

name: Wes Graff
text: These people are basically crooks. I had an incident with a customer involving a drain line that leaked into the floor overnight and made a mess. I went out to see the damage myself before we called servpro out to clean it up. It was very minimal water on the floor. The only reason I didn't clean it up myself is because I didn't have a shop vac on my truck and thought it shouldn't cost more than a few hundred dollars to get it cleaned up, even though it was on the weekend, because there just honestly was very little that needed to be done. I was wrong. They charged me over a thousand dollars to do almost nothing besides vacuum up a small amount of water. Then on top of that they left their water bucket in the hallway over the weekend. It leaked water into the stairwell and ruined some of my clients ceiling tiles. When confronted about this Servpro management said that their bucket doesn't leak and that they were not going to replace the tiles. Please do not contact Servpro, they will take advantage of you on every turn.

name: LP
text: Professional Staff!  Very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: amy bentley
text: Can't say enough about the professionalism and service we received from ServPro in Tuscaloosa. Would highly recommend!

name: Thomas Billups
text:
My experience with Servpro of Tuscaloosa has been a nightmare for me and my family.
My 84 years old mother who suffers from Parkinson has been hurt more by Servpro of Tuscaloosa than by the tornado that damaged her home earlier in the year.
My parents used Servpro to store furniture and electronics in order to cleanup and rebuild after the tornado. Furniture stored with Servpro was returned broken, damaged and electronic items like televisions and a crystal chandelier are missing. Six months after they were paid by the insurance company and four months after returning the damaged items Servpro owner Don Elmore has yet to make things right. They are so eager to drum up new customers that they don’t service their current customers. Their customer service stinks.

name: J.R. Cunningham
text:
Worst experience of a lifetime. Lost valuable jewelry, broke a tv, scarred furniture. I asked for them to pay for the things. The answer from Kevin Driggers was, "Mr. Cunningham don't wait for a check from us, if we paid every complaint we'd go broke."
That is about the only true statement I heard from ServPro. They are not members of BBB.
The owner Don Elmore's final word to me were, "just sue me, sue me, I have insurance, sue me."
In my opinion I would never again allow my insurance  company to employ this business, nor could I recommend anything good about them.

name: Charles Hawthorne
text: Very professional and courteous employees.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words toward our team!

name: Carl Noland
text: Ok

name: Mona Hardy
text: Nice

name: Candy Johnson
text: They were very professional and courteousThey were very professional and courteous and didAnd did a very nice job

name: Janet E
text: Be very careful.  They ruined the finish on my brick floors and also made spots on hardwoods with a "new pre-treatment chemical" and a leaky container while cleaning my carpets.  Dodged me me for a month until I finally gave up and filed with BBB.  Never did get a call or reply from the owner.  And yes, I know him and know they've always had a good reputation.  But the repeated flat out ignoring, making excuses and never repairing...leaves me no choice.

name: Supreme Storage
text: I can't begin to express how awesome this crew is. I have been in touch with the job supervisor more than any other vendor in the last 12 years at multiple facilities. They stay on top of the job, checking throughout to assure all is good. They did a great job cleaning and applying epoxy to our concrete floors within our facility. We are already looking into having them as a constant vendor for maintenance and other jobs. Check out the before and after pics. Thanks to Chris and his crew for a job well done!!

name: Jef Park
text: Excellent work, went above and beyond what I asked them to do for a very fair price.

name: Sam Stone
text: Great Job is all I can say very knowledgeable and througal and prompt attention to our needs

name: Marty Thomas
text: Call these guys

name: Larry Bradley
text: Supposed to be here at 9:30 am. Well, it's 11:45 am and no carpet cleaners.

name: Jean McIntosh
text:
Re-screening of porch.  Screens are taut and almost invisible.
Replacing porch doors.
Repaired drywall and ceilings, painted interior of house.
Very nice people to work with.  Polite, hard working, cleaned up after each days work.
Have recommended this company to several friends.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and for referring us out!

name: BEVERLY Brown
text: I recently used the restoration services of Rick-N-Ball Restoration  after a flood in my basement. I was very impressed with their quick response. Andrew assessed the situation and stayed in contact until the work was completed. I highly recommend this company for any restoration projects.

resp.text: It was our pleasure to help you out Ms. Brown!

name: Courtney White
text: We had Eleanor as our water mitigation specialist. She was a pleasure to work with. She made sure all surfaces were covered to make sure there was no mess and that none of the equipment could damage anything. It was clear she was an expert and made sure everything was taken care of. I would recommend her and the company to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. White, this is Eleanor. I appreciate your thoughtful review! Please let me know if you need anything in the future.

name: Cat Darling
text: I couldn’t be more pleased with the work they did. Everyone that completed our project was very professional, pleasant to work with & worked with our schedule. They are our first choice for ANY upcoming project. Thank you so much. Also, want to give a shout out to Mike who did the carpentry work & painting. It looks better than before & can’t even tell there was a huge hole in the wall. Always on time, & I NEVER had to wait for him. Plus the fact that he had to climb the stairs at least a billion times ! Without complaining!  And Jeremy Marshall for the tiling. Beautiful job, & answered all my questions.):) Tommie was great as well even for the short time he was on the project.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star rating! We strive for all our customers to have excellent experience with us.

name: Sharon Cain
text: I will highly recommend Rick-N-Ball.  They were professional, knowledgeable and on time.  A special thanks to Helder!  Being a veteran, I appreciate land support companies owned and oerated by veterans.  Thanks again Kevin!

resp.text: It was a pleasure working with you. I enjoyed reminiscing about days in the service. I am glad we were able to restore the drywall to previous condition. Thank you for the kind words and review.

name: Ashley Mitchell
text: I appreciate this company and the work they did so much. In the beginning I felt overwhelmed with the work needed to repair the damage in my home. The Rick and Ball team went above and beyond to help me figure out a plan to get everything back to normal and make sure I was completely  happy with every detail. They helped take all the stress out of the repairs needed to get my home back to normal. Each employee I worked with was polite and respectful. They kept my home clean and safe while doing the repairs which was important to me since I have a young child.  I recommend this company to all my friends and family.

resp.text: We truly appreciate your business and thoughtful review! Keep us in mind if you have any issues in the future. Thanks.

name: Lauren Milam
text: Rick and Ball Restoration is an outstanding company. We had a leak in our roof 1 month after purchasing it. We unfortunately had water damage to two locations in our home. Andrew came out immediately to begin mitigation. He kept us updated throughout the process and was very thorough and knowledgeable. If you're in an unfortunate situation like we were, don't hesitate to call Rick and Ball.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the excellent review! I hope you enjoy your new home!

name: Shileen Needle
text: They were fast to respond and did everything over the phone and email with me.

name: John&Jeanene St. Amant
text: Rick-n-Ball did a fabulous job on our bathroom remodel, will definitely be using them again in the future.  We have been recommending them to all of our friends.

resp.text: Thank you for your loyalty and I'm glad we were able to help you with your project!

name: Rob H***
text: They came in, sized up the work that needed to be done and got to work. Courteous, confident and communicated throughout. Took pictures required by insurance and didn’t leave till absolutely certain everything was dry.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! That was a busy time with the freeze, I'm glad we were able to help!

name: Mike Okesky
text: This company did a great job of removing the mold under my mother's house. Then they had to replace some of the floor joust and subflooring. After they made sure the floor was in good condition they put down new flooring and painted the baseboards. I would recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It was a pleasure working with you. I believe the new flooring selections really brightens up the kitchen.

name: Anna Talyn
text: We had water damage at our house and they did an amazing job. Very professional and I really appreciated their thoroughness and approach to helping us choose the best options for repairs. All the subcontractors followed thier code of ethics and honestly after working with many companies in the past, these are the guys I'd call or recommend going forward. On time and great communication and follow through. Sincerely appreciate them and impressed.

resp.text: This is such a well thought out and kind review of our company! Thank you so much!

name: NothinEvenMatters AtAll
text: I called and got an immediate response. They were very thorough when discussing the remodeling project. They were both pleasant and professional and very veteran friendly (being as they are a veteran run company). Would definitely recommend/use again!

name: Kyle O'toole
text: Andrew and Kevin are experts at what they do. Their company has helped my parents with multiple projects and the outcome is stellar. From drying out the kitchen from a leaking refrigerator line to the encapsulation of their crawl space. Well done!!

resp.text: Thanks Kyle! It's always great to work with you and your family!

name: rscotta831
text: Kevin is the most professional contractor I’ve ever worked with. Dried out the water damage in the shower. Jeremy Marshall installed the new shower tile. The three of us addressed every detail either before or during the remodel. Both guys went above and beyond to make sure every step went smoothly. Both guys are 5-stars.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. I think the new tile shower and frame less glass door was an awesome upgrade. Thank you for trusting Rick-n-Ball Restoration with the project!

name: Mary Holt
text: Had leak in wall between closet and bathroom..had 5 holes in wall and they patched those up and put in new baseboards in closet and bathroom..it looks great and they got it done in a timely manner..also they were very friendly and professional and answered any questions I had...i would definitely use them in the future and recommend them to anyone who needs something done

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and review. Look forward to coming back and doing the flooring in the laundry room and bathroom when you are ready.

name: Cynthia Brown
text:
So pleased with all work. From the no pressure estimate, debris removal, preventive encapsulation - to the restoration of moisture damaged wall - complete satisfaction.

Andrew and team communicative on work schedule and progress toward completion. Answers to questions, right on target.

Thanks to Andrew and his entire professional team. A job well done.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ms Brown! Let us know if we can help in the future!

name: Outlaw Outdoors
text: These guys were very professional, reliable, helpful and went above and beyond to see to it that everything was exactly how it was supposed to be and they even came back out 3 months later to reattach the air duct that worked itself off somehow. I would highly recommend these guys for all of your remodeling projects and needs ! Great job guys

resp.text: Thank you so much! As always, we stand behind our work. Thank you for trusting us to do a good job for you.

name: Thomas Crisafulli
text: They were the most professional company I’ve ever dealt with. From their initial assessment through the demolition process until the final restoration I was completely informed of the procedures and timetables.  Every crew that was used was equally respectful and professional. All the work was done when promised and nothing was overlooked. I would recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for you thorough review. Your new floors look fantastic! It's always a rewarding feeling when a project comes to a close, and we thank you for trusting Rick-N-Ball to restore the damage to your home.

name: john carson
text: These folks went above and beyond for us. Fantastic high quality work that left our house better than before and in less time than was expected. I would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you sir. I believe the Luxury Vinyl Plank looks great in the bathroom. It was a nice upgrade.

name: Peggy D'Angelo
text: Professional and efficient.  Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! Happy we were able to help!

name: Deb Robinson
text: We hired Rick-N-Ball Restoration as a result of a roof leak in one of our bedrooms and on the recommendation of the roofing repair company.  These guys were incredibly responsive; price was very competitive and they did an outstanding job repairing the damage in the bedroom.  A particular shout out is for Blake who led the team and was responsive and when they couldn’t find trim and other parts that matched what we already have, they took the trouble and tracked it down in just a couple of days and everything was installed and painted beautifully.  You would never know that anything happened in that room and in fact the paint color they were able to match to where I had no idea where the old paint stopped and the new paint started they did such a great job matching a unique paint color.  Blake would contact us and let us know the status of everything so that we always knew where things were, when we would receive things, when his team would come by and finish and we highly recommend this company.

resp.text: We are glad to have been able to help you out! We're lucky to have such great employees, and thank you for the thorough review. I was worried we'd have to get some custom made crown but Blake knew just where to look!

name: Debbie Colley
text: Andrew and the mitigation team were quick to respond to our flooded rooms. They were efficient, professional and effective. They handled all of the necessary coordination necessary to determine the cause of the leak and dry everything out. I look forward to using them for the reconstruction end as well.  What a blessing to find a company that handles the entire job! I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Colley! I'm glad we were able to tackle it so quickly. We look forward to getting your floor upgraded and getting your couches moved back in!

name: Margaret Caufield
text: This was my first time having a contractor work on my house and it could not have gone more smoothly. Blake always kept me up to date with the state of the project and responded quickly to any questions I had. There was a bit of a setback to the schedule when the problem was worse than expected, but they had workers come on the weekend to help put it back on track. The finished work they did on the bathroom looks spectacular. They got my input on every detail from exhaust fan to rough end kits which did did require learning some new terms, but ensured that the end product was exactly what I wanted.

resp.text: Thank you for your thorough review. This project did have some unforseen challenges, but we were able to work through them together to keep you within your budget while maintaining your overall vision. Removing that old style of concrete over wire with 4x4 tiles, and raising the ceiling of your shower certainly did modernize your master bath. Thank you for trusting Rick-N-Ball!

name: James Johnson
text: Very professional company.  Always on time and did the work for a fair price.  Great job cleaning up when done.  Work was top notch.

resp.text: Mr Johnson, it was truly an honor being entrusted to repair such a beautiful home. We pride ourselves on professionalism and cleanliness, and we are pleased to hear that our trusted partners are following our top P.I.C.K. credo of Perseverance Integrity Compassion and Knowledge.

name: David Conrad
text: Blake was a pleasure to work with. He kept me informed about what was going on. He answered emails and texts promptly. The sub contractors did a good job and, very importantly to me, they were there when they said they would be.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Conrad for your thorough review. We appreciate your patience with all the shipping difficulties we faced during this difficult time. Thank you for trusting with your bathroom and flooring projects. I think the new LVP looks wonderful and will for years to come.

name: Kim Weinland
text: Eleanor was awesome to work with! I would definitely recommend them to anyone needing their services. What could have been an absolute nightmare has been a pleasure. She knows her stuff! Thanks Eleanor for everything!!!!

resp.text: We love a good review and love it even more when our amazing employees get called out for a job well done!

name: Daniel Sampson
text: These guys are very professional at what they do. Excellent crew and I highly recommend them. On time every time and stay in contact with me. Thanks, EXCELLENT JOB!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Sampson! We strive to keep our customers in the loop.

name: Justin Donnell Givens
text:
Wow, the work they did was amazing!

We had a pipe leak under the slab. We initially choose another company to replace the pipe leak and man do I wish we used Rick-N-Ball. The first company only did the pipe fix and left us with a huge mess.

They came in sealed off all hallways and kept the dust completely contained. They had to level off the concrete slab, replace hardware, fix drywall and paint. The area looks like nothing ever happened.

Seriously wish we would have used them for the whole project.

Would I recommend Rick-N-Ball: Yes
Would I use them again: Yes

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Givens. We are happy that we were able to take care of your project for you. Tying into an existing hardwood floor can be a messy process, but proper containment can help to minimize the effect of demolition on the rest of your home. Thank you for trusting us!

name: Fred Maksimowski
text: Services were professionally provided to my satisfaction. I would recommend them to anybody  without exception. They were on time and well managed.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review. The new Luxury Vinyly Tile looks great.

name: Mitchell Summerlin
text: We are in the process of working with them right now.  So far they have been prompt, competent, and professional.  The company is owned and operated by veterans.  I like that.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Mr Summerlin!

name: Karen Anders
text: From the first day of contact to the final day of completion, they kept me informed the entire way through the insurance process. Kevin and Andrew were a pleasure to do business with. They went above board with the reconstruction process. We asked for several additional tasks to be performed and they jumped right on it. We would recommend Rick-N-Ball Restoration to anyone and use them again in a time of need!

resp.text: Ms. Anders, thank you for being such a great customer of ours, and thank you to your son Kyle for referring us to you! Dealing with water damage in your home is never a fun experience but we are glad we took some of the stress out of the process. Merry Christmas!

name: Geraldine Telfare
text:
We recently discovered major water leaks in our home that resulted in extensive damage to several walls and hardwood flooring.  Rick-N-Ball Restoration+Construction, Inc was recommended to us by another repairman and what a blessing it was.  Word of mouth is certainly the best way to get the word out.
From the first meeting with Kevin and associate we were made to feel comfortable with what they had to offer.  The first satisfying thing was knowing they could provide all services required which were substantial.  No middle man to deal with, just Rick-N-Ball, with Kevin providing an exceptional job of being the point of contact.  He was always receptive, courteous, professional and punctual.
All the services required to bring our home back to its original status were done.  Drywall, carpet, hardwood removal and replacement were done to include drying walls and flooring as required.  To top it off they even rented the pods and removed and replaced the furniture after new hardwood was installed.
We are happy to recommend Rick-N-Ball Restoration.  They are a competent, professional, courteous, dependable, timely and very customer oriented company.  Should we have restoration requirements in the future, God forbid.  would we call them again?  Absolutely and positively yes, they do everything, no worries at all.
Thank you for a job well done!!
James and Geraldine Telfare

resp.text:
Wow, thank you for the awesome review and kind words! It was certainly a pleasure working for you guys. Although a complex project with multiple trades from plumbing, electrical, drywall, flooring etc. I was very pleased we were able to set appropriate expectations and meet the discussed schedules. You have a beautiful home and we were thrilled to compliment it with the exotic tiger wood you selected. It turned out gorgeous. I don't expect you will need it but remember you do have a full warranty on all labor and material should anything arise. Thanks again.
V/r,
Kevin Ball

name: Shelia Robertson
text: My husband and I had water damage and mold underneath our home this past July.  Andrew (with Rick-n-Ball) and his crew of 4 worked hard and long days to remove all of the mold underneath our home and repaired the damaged wood underneath there.  There were mold spores that had gotten in our HVAC air ducts which caused our air inside our home to be compromised.  Everything inside our home was wiped down and air scrubbers brought in to rid the air and surroundings of these mold spores.  We were able to move in shortly afterwards. We were very well pleased with their work and would highly recommend Rick-n-Ball to anyone that needs this type of work done in their home.  Give Rick-n-Ball a call.  You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Ms. Robertson, it was a pleasure working with you and your husband on this job. I'm so happy we we able to get it done in a timely and efficient manner. Hopefully you won't need us again,  but if you do, you know who to call!

name: Cindy Thompson
text: Kevin, Blake, Jeremy, and the entire crew were extremely professional, friendly, and just great to work with. We were planning to redo our shower when they found a leak that damaged our floors as well. Kevin handled the entire process with our insurance company, and we were able to redo our entire bathroom and replace the flooring throughout most of our house. It looks absolutely fantastic, and we couldn't be more pleased. Thanks guys for a job well done!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Thompson for your review. It was our pleasure to help you through what can often be a scary and overwhelming project. The shower tile and flooring you selected looks fantastic!

name: AD Williams
text: Andrew was awesome at getting our ceiling dried out.  He then handed it off to Blake to sort out the painting remediation.  Would recommend them fir general projects as well as remediation

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! We try to showcase the full service aspect of our business whenever we can.

name: Annette Aubuchon
text: Very happy with the people and quality work that was done.  I would use them again and recommend them as well.  They cleaned up did a great job.

resp.text: We greatly appreciate the positive review!

name: Ronald Terrell
text: Had a small job I needed done. They came out and estimated the repairs and cost in the morning. Had someone come out that afternoon to do the repair. Excellent job responding and fixing my problem. Even though it was a small job, it was performed quickly and professionally.

resp.text: Timing is everything not always able to make it happen that fast but glad it worked out. Thanks for the great review.

name: Kay Summers
text: Kevin went above and beyond to info and help us get our home repairs done in the most cost effective way.  His professionalism and prompt response could not have been better.  Great company to work with!

name: Calamity Coccyx
text: Andrew is a consummate professional. He is honest, hardworking and attentive. He did everything he promised to do (and in a timely manner) and was conscientious about small details. I would not hesitate to hire him again.

resp.text: Thank you for the thoughtful review! A happy customer makes our job worthwhile.

name: Pelto Justin
text: The best! I cannot thank Kevin and Andrew enough, they both along with crew did an amazing job! We had a pretty decent flood issue in our home and they came out right away to help address and fix the problem. The response was quick and exactly what we needed. The attention to detail and care they put forth to our home and family was second to none. I would recommend them to anyone needing repairs or remediation. Top notch!

resp.text: Thank you, Justin. It was a pleasure working with you. I am glad we were able to address the water damage so quickly as it really kept from causing any damage to your hardwood floors. Thanks again and Merry Christmas!

name: Kenneth Ward
text: They were excellent: professional and proficient, personable and courteous. They came out to check on my roof (had some ceiling spots in the kitchen)... no problem there but some loose ductwork was found and fixed via the attic.  Thanks a bunch Kevin and Andrew, I'll definitely contact you again for roof, leak and associated problems.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback Mr. Ward. We were happy to be able to find and address the issues for you.

name: Betty Cochran
text: They were always on time and worked without wasting time.  They were very professional and did a wonderful job!  I would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone and would definitely hire them again!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. Glad we were able to work together to get that not knocked out quickly.The luxury vinyl tile in the kitchen looks great!

name: Larry Couvillon
text: Andrew with Rick-N-Ball did a great job of coming up with a creative and affordable  solution for my crawl space. He was very responsive, professional and thorough in his communication and service delivery. I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Couvillon, it was a pleasure being able to assist you. We do our best to provide practical solutions as opposed to costly ones.

name: Daniel Woodward
text: Attention everyone! Rick-N-Ball Restoration is HANDS DOWN the restoration company you want to go with! I cannot say enough good things about the phenomenal service we received from them, from their extraordinary customer service to their exemplary quality of work. THESE GUYS WILL TAKE CARE OF YOU, GET THE JOB DONE, AND EXCEED EXPECTATIONS. They are friendly and approachable, understanding of your unique needs, patient with your questions and helpful with their answers. And man do they deliver the service you need! With years of experience under their belts, they know exactly what to look for to restore your home and make it even better than before!!! We worked with Kevin and he is an honest, good-natured, reliable and caring guy who will resolve your concerns. Your money is WELL invested with Rick-N-Ball.

resp.text: Thank you very much Mr. Woodward!

name: Greg Arndt
text: Had a small mold spot from a roof leak. Called and Kevin was out the next morning. I didn't know if they would respond to a small job but Kevin was there on time and had fixed up in less than an hour. Kevin is a vet who deployed three times. Always good to support the vet. I heartily recommend them.

resp.text: Mr. Arndt, thank you for the kind words and business. We are happy to take on jobs of all sizes, every customer is equally important. Glad we could take care of you in timely manner. We also appreciate your service. Thanks again!

name: Prism
text:
Fantastic company, high quality work, and gets the job done fast.

Well done.

resp.text: Thanks! We do our best to meet and exceed expectations.

name: Maureen Sylvester
text: I was very impressed by their professional, punctual and efficient service. I would highly recommend to  anyone for their restoration work. They're on top of my list.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mrs. Sylvester. I believe you made an excellent decision replacing your carpet with new vinyl plank. The new floor looks gorgeous!

name: Jake Wood
text: Amazing experience working with them. Very professional and great communication. I'll be highly reccomending them in the future

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Wood, let us know if we can help out in the future.

name: Bob Arnone
text: We had a particular challenge in that renovations we needed to our front porch had to meet HOA standards—and being an older house, the exact materials were no longer produced.  They found the equivalent designs and effectively and efficiently accomplished the renovations  BELOW estimated cost and on schedule

resp.text: Thank you Bob! It's always a challenge matching columns but we are glad we rose to the task.

name: teresa kendall
text: Rick-N-Ball turned a bad situation into a great experience! We required mold remediation work in our bathrooms, and decided to do a full renovation while things were already torn up. We are so glad we did!! Kevin had his Trusted Partners in and out like clockwork.. plumbers, tile, drywall, paint...! The estimate was reasonable and accurate, the work was exceptional, and the responsiveness was excellent. We're making plans for our next project with Rick-N-Ball!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We do have great Trusted Partners who help make the whole process seamless. We look forward to working with you again in the future. Thanks again!

name: Elaine Bowen
text: We hired Rick-N-Ball Restoration to fix a serious problem in our kitchen. We needed a contractor, cabinet crew, plumber, and electrician but did not know where to start calling. Andrew and Kevin took,over immediately and I did not have to do another thing. Everyday the crew was here exactly on time and called once to tell me they would be 15 minutes late. They finished on time and did a beautiful job. I would recommend them to all my friends, they were great!

resp.text: We are proud to have provided you with an excellent level of service Ms. Bowen! It has been a pleasure working with you and I must say, your red velvet cake that you shared was delicious!

name: Sundown Kelley
text: Responsive, organized, quiet and clean. They did a great job.

resp.text: Thank Mrs. Kelley. We are happy that we were able to find a solution to make your extra room feel more formal. Thank you for trusting us with your projects.

name: Kimberly Keeton
text: Everyone was pleasant to work with and  listened to what I needed.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It was a pleasure working with you. The new shower unit looks great. I'm glad we were able to find a solution to meet your budget.

name: Joe S
text: Rick-N-Ball Restoration was recommended to me by my insurance company, which was all the endorsement I needed.  We could not have been happier with the entire project.  We needed a few more things done once they got started, and they were able to do it all.  They kept me updated daily on their progress.  They are professional, neat and very trustworthy.  I highly recommend them for any repair work needed from water damage, whether it be under the house, outside the house or chimney related.

resp.text: Thank you, Sir. Happy to have been of service.

name: Sherry Roberson
text: I had an unexpected emergency at my home and called Rick-N-Ball and they responded within 20 minutes to my home.  Not only are they very professional and respectful they went beyond the call of duty to help me with my home flooding.  They came to my home everyday to evaluate the situation and took immediate action to ensure all damage was addressed and repaired in a timely manner.  I totally recommend this company for any services you may need.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ms. Roberson!

name: Morgan Breakfield
text: Rick-N-Ball have a passion for their profession and the people they come in contact with everyday. I would recommend these guys to anyone. They are very thorough and do an incredible job.

resp.text: Thank you, Morgan!

name: Nei Chiaradia
text: Kevin Ball and crew showed up at the agreed time and did a great job. It did not take them a lot of time to complete the work and they showed up on a Saturday! Competence and engagement.  I will certainly keep Kevin and team in my short list of approved service companies.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, glad we could help!

name: Gregory Shaw
text: As a veteran, I try to utilize locally owned / operated veteran businesses whenever possible.  My first dealing with Rick-N-Ball Restoration + Construction, Inc. was in October 2019 when they modified my back patio.  The work included designing and constructing an outdoor fireplace, building a roof over the entire patio and covering it with metal panels.  Their work was outstanding and completed on schedule.  My second experience was definitely unplanned and occurred after the main water line into my home started leaking.  Upon detection I immediately contacted Rick-N-Ball for assistance / guidance as I knew they worked closely with USAA and other insurance companies to mitigate water damage and reconstruct accordingly.  Shortly after contacting them Andrew arrived with a plumber and the source of this leak was quickly detected and repaired.  Kevin then guided me through the steps necessary to initiate a claim and continues to work with USAA on my behalf.  Their professionalism and genuine concern for the homeowner’s worries made this ordeal a little more bearable.  Rick-N-Ball has completed restoration and I cannot even tell there was a leak to begin with.  I strongly recommend you contact the folks at Rick-N-Ball Restoration + Construction Inc. for any planned upgrades and / or unexpected home emergencies due to fire, wind or water damages.

resp.text: Thank you for the generous review. We especially enjoy working with fellow veterans and where we can, offer military discounts. I think you and Amy did a wonderful job on the stone selection for the fireplace and the red metal roof looks fantastic. Also was glad we could help with the minor water damage. Had you not found it, the damage could have gotten a lot worse. Glad we were able to keep it to a small area in the home for you. Thanks again!

name: Sam Fleming
text: Kevin is honest and professional. Very knowledgeable and professional team.

name: A Friend
text: The Serv Pro crew did an excellent job. They were professional and very courteous. Arrived on time and cleaned up when they finished. The entire experience was very good. I highly recommend them to anyone needing this type of service.

name: Dominique Vickers
text: Ms. Jennie is hands down the best! She walks you through every inch of the process to make sure you have a complete understanding. Very professional and hands on! Highly recommend!

name: Mark Strong
text: Let me start by saying that this is the first time IN MY LIFE that I’ve written a bad review about a business, so the fact I feel strongly enough about this matter to do so should say enough in and of itself. Based off my family’s (ongoing) experience to-date with Servpro of Montgomery, I cannot and would not recommend this business to anyone. Mr./Mrs. Brooks, I kindly ask that you or someone in charge reach out to me in a timely manner.  As a courtesy and to give you a chance to address the issue, I will refrain from posting detailed information of surrounding incidents and the lack of professionalism and timeliness your company has exhibited thus far.  If I do not hear from anyone in a timely manner I will have to share my story in order to help future people hopefully never have to deal with the same issue(s).

resp.text:
Hi, Mark, I am the General Manager, and I am terribly sorry to hear about your family’s experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Kerry Brooks

name: Lashanda Gaines
text: The entire staff was helpful. There wasn’t a doubt that I wouldn’t be taken care of. They were swift, efficient and thorough during this time.

name: Linda Ross
text: The Servpro representatives worked tirelessly to locate all the water damage and begin the drying out process.  They were professional and friendly, always answering my questions explaining each step as they were worked.  I highly recommend them!

name: Kelsea Garrett
text:
I’m at a loss for words as I write this review, but am hopeful that what happened to our family doesn't happen to someone else.

My grandmother had a horrible fall that was devastating to her life. My  Dad trying to do everything he could in that moment to comfort family took a beautiful handmade silk pastel Turkish area rug to have cleaned.

With loss of family in that moment you don't think clearly especially when it's unexpected.  The rug was dropped off; there was no proof of receipt provided at the time.

The rug is no where to be found and because there was no receipt provided no proof we were told nothing can be done.

Being the price of the rug and sentimental value alone we hired an attorney to contact the store owner, and unfortunately were told there was no proof.

I hope nobody else ever has to have the same experience. Please be sure if dropping off a high ticket item regardless of the emotional state you may be in to get an exchange of a paper trail, the employee’s name, and would even add to take pictures. Beyond disappointed in how the owners have handeled this situation with no effort at all to make any attempt for a resolution.

resp.text: SERVPRO® of Montgomery is sorry to hear of the traumatic experience you and your family have suffered. Knowing what you have been through, it saddens us to know that you feel we have mishandled one of your family heirlooms. As stated in your review, there is no paperwork showing it was delivered to us for cleaning. We value our customers and enforce stringent protocols and procedures for any items entrusted to us. This helps to avoid any confusion or loss. I would like to personally investigate this matter but will need additional information to do so. Please contact our office at 334-284-1612 and ask for Kerry Brooks.

name: Cassie Spears
text: Wish I could give y'all 10 stars!! SUPER prompt, SUPER professional, efficient, effective, and just all around amazing! Ms. Jennie in the office, you have my sincerest thanks! Y'all dispatched an incredible team! God forbid I ever have to have a COVID cleaning again, but if I do, I know who to call!!

name: Amanda Geddie
text: Very great company to hire !!!!!! They were clean and very professional during the whole process!!! Best you can get !!!

name: Dean S
text:
Do you own an older home? You might want to remove the built up dust in your heating/cooling ductwork.
ServPro is an expert cleaning service and the cost of duct cleaning is very reasonable.The technicians, Lamont and Shine showed up promptly at 9AM as scheduled and completed the cleaning in about 4 hours.
Now, the dust on the grilles is gone and air quality has improved. We are very pleased with this firm.Their technicians are thorough and professional.

name: Thomas Gaughran
text: Austin and Jon did an excellent job.

resp.text: Great to hear, we strive to please!

name: Linda Finney
text: The adjuster was very prompt coming to see damage. I was pleased and look forward to hearing start date.

name: Judy Van Luchene
text:
Several days after the house was empty, we stopped to see the progress...nothing.  For two weeks, we checked every
day, no workmen.  We were assured we would be back in by Christmas.  We went through three Project Managers, and
three different set of drywall and painters.  The first painting crew stood on my washer and dryer to paint the
ceiling in the laundry leaving dents and scratches.  We had stored the liquor from our bar in tubs in the garage,
as Servpro would not remove alcohol from the home.  Apparently the painters had found it and consumed a great deal
before they were removed from the job by Darin Ingle.  They also got paint all over our floors so Servpro brought
in commercial scrubbers which removed the finish on all of our floors.

To shorten this story, I will cut to the return home.  We finally returned to our home in early March with work still
going on, Painting and damaged floors. The first night home the water under the sink of my brand new cabinets
flooded the kitchen.  They had to send in dryers and a plumber who said it was not hooked up correctly and
reworked all of the kitchen dishwasher and sink plumbing. They sent in a professional flooring company  to assess
the floors. Their solution required us to move back into a hotel for at least a week so they could clean, reseal
the tile and recolor the grout.

The only thing that saved this project was Darin Ingle who arrived on the project in February.  Darin was sent in from another state to resolve the
problems at the Montgomery location that included our home.  Darin took the reins, brought in new crews and came
every day to ensure the work got back on track and that it was done correctly.  Darin's arrival was months into
the project and while we have never sued anyone, we were on the verge of doing just that to get another company
to come in so we could go home.  I am not sure if Servpro's executives realize that Darin not only saved our project,
saved them from a lawsuit but did an amazing job saving their reputation.  I would only call them again if Darin Ingle handled the job.
Because of Darin, I am giving Servpro a 2 star rating and Darin a 5.

An update to my review.  I was contacted by Mr. Bowen, an owner.  Mr. Bowen was determined to do something to do something for All we had been through.  He offered to send in a crew or something.  While his offer was appreciated, we had already fixed many of the issues and did not feel we could ensure another work crew I agreed to think it over and get back with him.  The one thing, as I explained to him, that distressed me everytime I went into the laundry was the dents and scratches on the tops of the washer and dryer which he eagerly agreed to replace.  With much of manufacturing shut down for long periods, appliances are in short supply.  However, Mr. Bowen and Darin Ingle were able to replace order And have new ones installed.  My frustration is no longer renewed when I walk into my laundry room.  My thanks to Mr. Bowen for reaching out and making this a better experience, and to Darin Ingle for making it happen.  It is good to know they cared to make things better.

resp.text:
Hi Judy, I am one of the owners and I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Bruce Bowen

name: Joshua Davis
text: I called Paul Davis to come and clean up water issues in my conditioned Crawl space.  They were fast to come out but that is where to positive things stop.  They were also quick to want to get my insurance involved.  They removed the water and the vapor barrier in my crawl space.  They also happened to remove about $1500 dollars worth of hiking, camping and repelling gear as well.  I emailed them about the issue and mentioned that they had also broken all the light bulbs in the crawl space and left my yard a mess from driving in it.  I would certainly stay away from using them.  The crew leader was a nice guy.  They also unplugged the sump pump in my crawl space and didn't plug it back in.  After all the rain this caused my crawl space to be flooded again.  The initial leak was from a busted pipe.  They left me with cleaning the water up myself.  I should have never called them.  After emailing them and getting no response I called and they said someone would call me to work things out, but they never did.  They worked with the insurance to get paid from day one but when they got their money they did not care about the customer.

name: Dustin Shaw
text:
This is the BEST mold removal/water damage company in the greater Birmingham Area. Jason is a pleasure to work with. On-time, great work, and very professional. He took his time to inform me of the extent of the problem, the cause of the problem, and the best and most cost-effective solution. In all of my years having home repairs both big and small, I never met someone that cares so much and is willing to meet my needs as him.

If you ever have a need for water damage solutions for your home, you will be doing yourself and your family a great service for making the call to him.

text: Jason came out and checked/cleaned the dryer vent & duct — very professional and prompt. We are new to the area and I appreciated his warm welcome. Give him a call for HVAC and other services.

text: My dryer was not working correctly and nothing was coming out of my vent.  I called and they call they next day.  Johnny and Darvin did a very thorough job of cleaning and even found a birds nest. They were very professional and nice.  I would highly recommend Advantaclean.

text: Dryer Duct Cleaning:  On time, courteous, wore a mask at all times, did good work and cleaned up after himself.  I am a happy camper.

text: Called to have house looked at, said they'd come out the next day at 10:30. 12:30 came around and no show, no call. Called them and 1:00, the girl tried to call Jason, she could not get him and said I don't know whats going on or where he is, we'll give you a call back.. Here we are 4 days later... still waiting on that call.  If they were running behind and called, no big deal. But, to not show or call is not a good first impression.

text: These guys are awesome!! Took care of everything I needed in order to sell my house. Such a great crew and Jason was helpful, professional and truly went above and beyond. Give them a call for sure. Thanks guys!

Two hours later I finally called again and told me he will come next day at 9am. Well two days later no service, they never came, never called until I called back. They have no idea where their employee and they cannot reach him. Very unprofessional.

He explained everything he was doing so that I could understand, he was open to any questions I had & was super polite and professional. He pumped out our septic tank and made this pregnant woman's life much much better now that we can use our toilets again!!! THANK YOU AGAIN MATT!!! You ROCK!!! :-)

Keep up the excellence in your professionalism.

text: I had a couch and recliner cleaned, protected, and deodorized. After they left... the portions between the couch were not even wet and it was still dirty. I have an animal and understand pet hair is not part of the service. It is not pet hair that was left. For the price of the service it was a completely awful experience and I will never use them or recommend them. Also, the smell I was trying to get out of my couch is still in the couch but only towards the middle. So the couch was cleaned better in some areas than other. I have a picture but for some reason it will not let me attach it right now. I will revisit this post to attach the picture.

text:
The employees showed up 1.5 hours early without notifying me(said they tried to call which there is no record of on my only phone number) and did not have masks on when i answered the door. They reluctantly put them on when i insisted.
The price quoted was $317 but changed to $467 because the room was considered as two ( i had told the office it was large). I had worked for two days getting furniture moved so i went ahead and had the tile cleaned and sealed. Big mistake! While the guys were very pleasant,
The work they did was nothing spectacular and certainly wasn’t with over $400.
It was absolutely NOT worth my work and money to have my floor look no better than when i have done it myself with a steamer.
I will not recommend this to friends or family.

name: Jennifer Needham
text: DO NOT USE THEM FOR TILE CLEANING AND GROUT SEALING! Paid for tile cleaning and grout sealing. Crew had to come out 3 times in one day to attempt to fix and finish. First, they forgot to seal the shower that we paid $90 for them to do. Then, we noticed a film all over every single tile that would not come up; Technician did NOT allow the tile and grout to dry before spraying grout sealer..Then, did not wipe off the excess grout sealer, just left it all over each and every tile. 3rd trip out of same day to day to try and fix it, they used every chemical, scrubber machine, everything they had to try and get it off, guess what, didn't work. So now, my grout is wet UNDER the sealer, which never had proper curing time, because they did not let the grout dry before applying, and my tiles have giant stains, splotches, blobs all over every single one because they did not remove the sealer from the tile after spraying the grout. And on top of it, one of the technicians decided that no, all of my white grout was actually completely stained before they got here that's why it's dark (Not because it was wet, which was the case)..He ended up arguing with me and cursing at me. So corporate will be getting a call this afternoon. Floors look 10x worse than what they did before they were out. Mind you, this was over a $450 job.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your recent experience using Stanley Steemer. We want you to know that we value you as a customer and are truly sorry that you have been inconvenienced in this way. We would like to learn more about your experience and to see if there is anything that we can do to restore your faith in Stanley Steemer. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com with your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account or contact us at 1-800-783-3637 ext. 4903. Once we have located your account, someone from management will be in contact with you. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention and we look forward to hearing back from you.

text:
Customer service was great when I called to schedule my carpet cleaning.  Very friendly and explained all cost and appointment details.  The two men they sent to clean my carpet were extremely nice and professional.  They were knowledgeable of all aspects of the cleaning and answered all of my questions.

Unfortunately, after the carpet dried, many of the stains came back which was very disappointing.  The men told me that they had used the strongest stain remover they had .  It obviously didn't work well enough.

text:
The very first thing I told the crew was that there were three cats in the house and they were not to be let outside. The next thing I knew they had my door standing wide open. This should have been communicated to me at the time of my warning so I could have locked up the cats at that time rather than going into mass panic.

I guess I was expecting too much from the tile cleaning. Though they spent a good two hours pre treating and then steaming the tiles didn’t look any better from when I used my own home steam cleaner, except in the areas where the washer and dryer previously sat in my laundry room.

resp.text: Hi Denise, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your service using Stanley Steemer. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com and include your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account. name: Janet W
text: I am blown away at how amazing this company and it's employees are.  I had some damage to my ceramic tile and scheduled an appt over the internet.  The app said they were available at 8AM on Monday (and this was 8PM on Sunday.  I tried scheduling, thinking they would call and say they needed to set me up at another time.  Instead, I got a call at 8:10AM saying a team was on the way.  Dane and his partner were AWESOME.  They were worried that they would not be able to correct the damage I had done,  so Dane went into great detail about what to expect (he did not want me to be disappointed).  After much discussion, I told him to "go for it".  He did a superb job of fixing what I had messed up with his corrective cleaning technique.  He cleaned to rest of the floor sparking clean and fresh.  The results were much better than I expected and I am very happy with his hard work and diligence in making certain I was fully informed about potential upside and downside of the process.  It was quick, convenient and more than lived up to my expectations.  Would give this team and all of Stanley Steemer 10 stars if possible.

text: Watch their pricing and get quotes. They are already 50% more than competition for normal service. Deodorant or other add-ons will double the price. Didn't make sense so I asked and couldn't get a satisfactory reason why the hard surfaces were so much more expensive, except 'that's our price, that's always been our price.' Well these prices just don't seem reasonable to me. Otherwise, can't fault the service. As a commercial company, we need affordable and predictable prices and find these elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi Darin, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. They checked out the areas to be cleaned, asked if we had any special concerns (which we did and they addressed) and they went right to work. name: Carli Parrish
text:
I just purchased a home and wanted the carpets cleaned before I moved my things into the home. I hired Stanley Steemer to come out on the day of closing. I could’ve rented a carpet cleaner from Publix and taken my time to clean my carpets and would’ve had a better result. I thought hiring professionals would save me time and I would have professionally cleaned carpets. Unfortunately that didn’t happen, they rushed and left dirty spots that I later cleaned myself. Not to mention they didn’t touch the areas around the base boards. I wasted over $300!
Update!
I received a call this morning and it’s was explained that my carpets had been neglected and that’s was why the carpets looked unclean. I really appreciate that fact that Stanley Steemer took the time to respond to my complaint!

resp.text: Hi Carli, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding this information along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this matter and contact you directly. We have located your account information, to ensure we are contacting the correct location. Please email us at customerrelations@steemer.com (mailto:customerrelations@steemer.com) if you have any further questions or concerns. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: Dianne Cline
text: I had a water leak in my laundry room that damaged the flooring in my dining room, bedroom, and bedroom closet. Restoration 1 was recommended to me, and on the same day I called them they arrived at my house late that afternoon. Since my house is only a year old, I was pretty upset about the damage, but Cheryl sat down with me, told me what they would do, and reassured me that they would take care of the cleanup and handle my insurance claim. She is so kind, thoughtful, professional, and will advocate for you. The 2 technicians, Jeff H and Scott were amazing! They had very technical tools to assess the water damage and worked quietly but efficiently. They set up fans, humidifiers, & taped down cords. They came back to inspect every day until everything was dry. They are very professional, nice, and respectful young men! I put down towels to soak up the water before they came, and they took all my wet towels with them, had them washed, dried, and folded, then delivered them back to me. Who does that? This company is fabulous and these employees go above and beyond. They also took a soaked rug under my dining room table, had it cleaned and delivered to me.

resp.text: Ms. Cline, we loved meeting and getting to know you even through this water damage experience in your laundry room. It was our pleasure to be able to help you navigate through your insurance claim. Though we hope you don’t need us, please don’t hesitate to let us know if you have water, mold, fire damage needs in the future.

name: martha creasman
text: My first review is unfinished so I wanted to say that Jeff D, Scott& Carol are my heroes! They were courteous, professional, & did a great job! I would highly recommend this Birmingham group to anyone. They were very reasonable in cost & didn’t try to up sell me. I am very glad that I chose this company.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Ms. Creasman! We loved meeting you and helping you out.

text: If you have mold concerns, I highly recommend reaching out to Restoration 1! Cheryl, Scott & Jeff D were professional, honest and did a fantastic job removing the mold in my attic. Turns out our counts were low and we only had a small amount to remove in the attic, which they promptly took care of. Thank you, Restoration 1!

name: Fultondale Public Works
text: The City of Fultondale chose to have some of the existing facilities sprayed in response to  COVID-19 as a precautionary measure for its employees as well as the public spaces.  We contacted Restoration1 and  Jeff D, Scott, and Richard responded and handled our request immediately.  They were very courteous and even came after hours in order to keep normal operations going.  We have used them on multiple projects and will use them in the future .

resp.text: It is our pleasure to serve the city of Fultondale.

name: Cary South
text: I was very pleased with the professionalism of the workers who represent this company. My first quote I got for sewage removal, the guy who showed up to give me a quote was wearing khakis and loafers. He stuck his head in the crawl space and said $2500 to do the job. He didnt even fully inspect the job, he didnt want to get dirty. So, I called Restoration One to get a different quote. Jeff came out and put on a saftey suit and actually went in the crawl space to accuratley inspect the problem. Well he found a mold issue just beginning and brought it to my attention and also pointed out the reason i asked them to come, to check ansewage clean up, he said wasnt necessary for him to do if i had the time to do it myself. Cost me about $100, compared to $2500. So ofcourse I went with this company to do the mold removal. They were on time and respectful, always kept in touch and kept me up to date with the job. They did an excellent job. If you are in the position of trying to find a company who will be honest and not take advantage of you, this is the one. I used to work HVAC and they would push me to sell things that werent necessary, which I never liked to do. When I knew that wasnt thier agenda, i was sold. I was overall very pleased with this company and would highly recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Cary, it was our pleasure to be able to help you find that your sewage problem was smaller than anticipated. It was also our pleasure to be able to identify and remediate the small amount of mold in your crawlspace. I hope you don’t need it, but if we can ever help you with any future water, mold, fire, or smoke issues, please don’t hesitate to call us at Restoration 1 of Birmingham.

They performed a mold remediation treatment, installed a dehumidifier in the crawl space, replaced the crawl space door, and sealed the crawl space vents with cover that I provided, and all for a very reasonable price.

I would certainly use Rainbow International again for a situation similar to this one, and I would recommend their serviced to others in this situation as well.

Highly pleased and would highly recommend H2O!!

name: Chris Bartlett
text: I would highly recommend H2O waterproofing I called with an issue at the recycling plant they came out the next day, the repair was done within 36 hours at a very reasonable price!!! I would highly recommend for all of your waterproofing needs!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and 5 star review. It was our pleasure to serve you.

name: Terry Cooper
text: H2O did a great job, Water was coming into my basement I called on Tuesday they had somebody come out by Wednesday and within a week the job was totally completed- drywall put back up -I could not be happier thank you H2O for all your help

resp.text: Thank you for trusting in us. We really appreciate your 5 star review and kind words.

name: Dazzling Mystic
text: They came out and tried their best to fix the problem we had. They even tried to find our main drain clean out. Their tools was just to big to go the only way they knew how to do it without the main drain clean out. They where polite and did not take a dime even when I offered to pay something for their time they spent and for trying. Very good company and will be hiring them to have a main drain clean out put in later and for my plumbing issues after.

name: brandon green
text: July12,2019,I had an invoice from Glenn Jennings for $480.00.  They fired Glen Jennings after I agreed to the quote. I agreed to it. I didn't hear from the company at all.They sent another plumber and he stated he didn't know anything about the previous quote and stated he couldn't honor it. The date was around August 21. After waiting a week to get a response about the quote, I called the Roto-Rooter back and asked to speak to the manager. The manager whom never returned my called. I think this was bad busy. I called another company  called Machen Plumbing who took very good care of me. And they gave me a cheaper quote 0f $295.00. They showed me the parts prices and the problem to all of my concerns. Here are all the pictures to prove. Please trust me, Do Not Go Though Roto Rooter At All!!!!!!!!!!!!You will be very disappointment.

resp.text: Hi Brandon, thanks for the feedback.. I am sorry for dropping the ball on your job. We have corrected both the manpower and process so we can do a better job next time. Randy

name: Linda Sufficool
text: I have had the pleasure of meeting TJ Woods twice, even though I never wanted to see him again haha (who likes plumbing issues?). Both times he was punctual, kind, and he listened to what I had to say. Although he was not able to fix my issue (city main sewer line) he was extremely helpful. He is the nicest repair man and I never want to need him again, but if I do, I know exactly who I will trust!

name: Melanie Gurley
text: Justin was knowledgable and professional.   Very pleasant. Played

text: I hadn’t been able to do laundry for several weeks. They came out and diagnosed the problem, fixed it in no time at all and had me back up and running very quickly. For a reasonable price as well. Thank you

name: Tony Cavitt
text:
The tech did a good job, in a reasonable amount of time. He was courteous and professional.
I do think $153 is rather steep for 30 min to snake/clear a grease clog.
I was put off one day from the original scheduling, which happens.
the only negative parts are: (1) when the tech called to reschedule the first appointment, i requested that he call me when he was on his way so that i could lock my watchdogs in the back BEFORE he got there. I also requested the same of the lady who called afterward to verify the appt change. Neither called before he arrived, dogs went ballistic when he turned in the drive and it was MUCH harder to get them kenneled. Very aggravating after asking both people!
(2) The tech came to my door with NO mask on expecting entry and I had to send him to his truck for a mask. We are elderly and my wife has COPD. That is irresponsible and surprising in the middle of this pandemic. It should be a mandatory requirement for Roto-Rooter...

name: Sandra Persons
text: The tech was great!  Kept updating me on what was going on.  Was honest with me about what was causing the problem.  Got everything going again.  Highly recommend them.  Great service.

name: CEM CEM

name: Lori Crabtree
text: He was extremely nice, helpful, and informing.  He was letting me know everything he was trying.  I appreciated that!

text: So far I have only had a estimate.  The tech was friendly and  observant . I am waiting to see how the actual  service go. My appointment is soon.

text: The Young Man Was Very Professional And Polite, He Solved My Problem With Ease. Thank You! Roto Rooter!!

name: Mike Yeager
text: Hunter contacted me and showed up at the agreed time. Asked a few questions and gave me a estimate which I ok'd and he got right to work. Was very professional and polite. Job well done in record time. I definitely recommend these services.

name: Melissa Wilson
text: Very fast response and easy to work with.

name: Jeff Bost
text: The service man that met me at the house was 10 min late which is no big deal.  He was friendly and was 6-7 out of 10 for his knowledge of well systems.  I chose to use home advisor to contact professionalplumbers for me because it was advertised that I was to receive a free estimate for any repairs and/or services.  I then was informed at the end of his time at the residence that I would be responsible for a $122 service call fee.  Honestly it feels like a scam.  I would have never given permission for roto rooter to come here knowing this.  He was here for about an hour and 10 min. and I helped by running back and forth opening valves and turning off power to the pump.  Information is the key to good reviews and making money off of honest people...otherwise businesses are cheats and dishonest.  You have to decide as a business which you desire to be.  You will only be able to fool people who don't know any better.  It's a sad day for consumers when businesses drop to this type of low.

resp.text: Hi Mr Bost, thanks for your feedback.. I reviewed this with our Plumber and while he did perform the service he charged you for, he did not get your written approval to do the work. As such, I have removed the bill from your account. We are in the service business, our folks are trained to solve your problem.. As you said we invested over an hour of our time doing the job for you. All the best. Randy Anderson President.

name: Vernon Marable
text: The guys were very nice and professional.  They diagnosed the problem and explained it to me where I could understand what was going on. I highly recommend Roto-Rooter Plumbers.

name: Brittany Hendrix
text: JP truly did an amazing job fixing the two leaks my home had in the kitchen and bathroom. He had the job finished the same day he came out to do my inspection. Within just a few hours, he was finished and the work he did looks amazing!! Could not be more happy with the end results!

name: Angela Glass
text: The technician alerted me when he was on his way. He was very professional and worked hard to get the job done. He cleaned up afterwards as well.

name: Ellen Peck
text: The plumber that came out was great- very knowledgeable and efficient, explained everything clearly. My only complaint is that I called early in the morning and he couldn’t get here until after 4pm.

name: Matthew Weathington
text: Glenn Jennings was my technician (plumber). Before he arrived I received a text notifying me that he was on his way, and a picture of him so that I knew whom to expect. His appearance and attitude were extremely professional. Glenn is an excellent communicator who kept my expectations as a customer, right where they needed to be. An honest man with a work ethic like Glenn’s is not only a rare treasure, it was inspirational. He always answered his phone if I had a question. It was a pleasure to listen to his knowledge and expertise. I really can’t say enough good things about this man and the company for whom he works. I would recommend Roto-Rooter and/or Glenn Jennings to anyone with any plumbing/water/etc. issues. He is certainly an irreplaceable asset to any of Roto-Rooter’s potential customers. I will definitely call Roto-Rooter/Glenn Jennings first with any plumbing needs I have in the future. Needless to say, they both come HIGHLY recommended.

name: April Kennedy
text: The tec was real professional. Did the job in a timely manner. I will have Roto-rooter do all my plumbing needs

name: Gary Shelton
text: Everything went very well, if the  sink stays unclogged I consider that well spent money. And with the guarantee in sure that I will stay very satisfied.

name: Andy Nevala
text:
Cameron spent three days working on our pipes in a difficult situation - saw it through to the end.  I will always call these guys first. The bill came in way less than I was anticipating for all the work they did. I used a local guy at first and He charged almost as much just to spray water in my clean out. Rotorooter came in, identified the problem, and corrected it.

Always go with the Nationaly licensed and insured company. Worth every penny.

name: Linda Smith
text: Believe all the bad reviews,  I will be writing a second review after review our cameras. 2 visits, 1st friendly techs, 2nd visit head tech absolutely unprofessional to the point his helper had to apologize, worst in class in all areas. I wish I took the time to read the reviews. #Criminals #Crooks #Thieves #Liars #LowClass #LackingSkill #Unprofessional #DoomedToRepeat #DefinitionOfInsanity

resp.text:
Hello Linda Smith, first I am sorry you had a bad experience. I would love to resolve it but I am unable to find you in our services database. We send out Google review requests to all our customers after service but your review did not come through that process. If you would please respond with your service address or call our office then I can work to resolve your issues. Thanks Randy

Part 2, No response from Linda Smith, no record of doing work for you.. we did discharge a plumber with the last name of Smith for dishonesty with a customer, so we can assume that you are related and your complaint is the result of his discharge.
